snippet: Mazarine Pingeot, the daughter of François Mitterrand and Anne Pingeot, his longtime mistress, has written a diary that includes her memories of Mr. Mitterrand as an attentive and doting father.
abstract: Saturday Profile of Mazarine Pingeot, daughter of former French Pres Francois Mitterrand and his longtime mistress Anne Pingeot; she has published a diary that includes her memories of Mitterrand as an attentive and doting father.
lead_paragraph: Mazarine Pingeot, the daughter of François Mitterrand and Anne Pingeot, his longtime mistress, has written a diary that includes her memories of Mr. Mitterrand as an attentive and doting father.

headline.seo: Mazarine Pingeot, Mitterrand Daughter, Looks Back
headline.main: State Secret Revealed: Mitterrand as a Doting Father
headline.print_headline: State Secret Revealed: Mitterrand as a Doting Father
